name: Hunting on Myths
description:
Play on land
In the cities you can accept tasks (quests) at an NPC and return after successful completion. Besides you can discover the whole island. Maybe you can find a cave a little distance outside. The open world offers many corners to explore.

Play on the high seas
At sea is the battlefield where pirates can fight against the royal navy or attack the sea monsters together with their guilds. and also the tradesmen are armed with little canons to protect their goods against the pirates to arrive at their destination.

Our questsystem
Each faction has its own view of the main story. Important points of history are integrated in the history of each party. In addition to the main storyline and various side quests, there will also be a personal storyline. These varies based on answers to questions during character creation. There are tasks that you can do locally or on the island. But there are also tasks that take place on other islands or on the high seas. With the help of our economic system, there are also dynamic quests based on the buying behavior of the players.
Open world with reputation dependent islands
Not every island is accessible to every player. The Playerlevel does not matter. Rather, reputation in a faction is important whether enough confidence has been assembled to enter an island. However, this trust can also decline again, when you sink teammates from your own ranks. If trust has been abused too often, you end up on the blacklist of bounty hunters.

Design the gameaccording to your wish!
With us there are many ways to bring his own style into the game. For example, you can design your ship to your own wishes, give your character a new look, buy and set up your own house or you can put together your own combat skills with the help of our weapon and skill system.
